MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Little Sutton, affecting properties in Cedar Avenue and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.45PM on 7th December 2020.
